message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can discuss more in the next round if you think it's unfair.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 55/45.  This way, we both get a fair share and can avoid further losses due to inflation.
You wanted to compromise, but I'll take 70% now
Let's stop this back and forth.  I'm willing to go back to the 60/40 split, but we need to reach an agreement soon.  Inflation is eating away at our potential gains.
